In Tanzania, we carry out epidemiological and implementation research on rabies and its prevention and control across different parts of the country. This work has also contributed to multi-country and global studies to inform policy for rabies prevention and control.

This page displays data from our long-term contact tracing project in <b>Serengeti District</b>. See below for links to our other pages for research in Tanzania, or return to our hub:    
  
* Long-term contact tracing data from Ngorongoro District (LINK)    
* Implementation research on vaccination and surveillance approaches in Mara Region (LINK)  
* Large-scale mobile phone-based surveillance in Southern Tanzania (LINK)
